meanings.definition: The appearance or arrangement of clouds in the sky.
meanings.sent1: The artist painted beautiful cloudscapes in the sky.
meanings.sent2: I love looking at the cloudscapes during sunset.
meanings.sent3: The cloudscapes seemed to be playing hide and seek with the sun.
meanings.sent4: As the storm approached, the cloudscapes darkened ominously.
meanings.sent5: The photographer captured the vibrant cloudscapes in a stunning photograph.

meanings.definition: A view or representation of a sky filled with clouds.
meanings.sent1: The movie depicted dramatic cloudscapes in every scene.
meanings.sent2: We enjoyed a picnic under the peaceful cloudscapes.
meanings.sent3: The children imagined shapes in the fluffy cloudscapes above.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a canvas painted with ever-changing cloudscapes.
meanings.sent5: The airplane soared through the endless cloudscapes, a sea of white below.
